overview: TEAM NACS tries out film directing for the first time!  Introducing 'N43°'! From Hokkaido to you - a message card from the five members of TEAM NACS.  Each member has written and directed a different short movie for this 5 movie omnibus, where the keyword is their beloved native island of 'Hokkaido'!  Witness each of their individual creative skills, and watch as their unique perspectives are put on display.  Every part of these 5 stories, down to the themes, casts and genres, varies greatly in order to give you a continuously engaging and fun viewing experience! You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll be shocked, moved and refreshed by this new film series!
title: TEAM NACS FILMS N43°
